nodes.bodyText:
Please don't use a try catch block as a normal control structure in the code.
https://github.com/HugoMatilla/Effective-JAVA-Summary#57-use-exceptions-only-for-exceptional-conditions
I removed the assignment from the catch block and added an if-statement, which checks if field is null and sets a LinkedFile with a local file path. I hope that's what you meant.
Yes, thanks for the addition. Lgtm
